articles.title: App Store to Be 'Split in Two' Ahead of EU iPhone Sideloading Deadline - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple is preparing to split the App Store "in two" in the coming weeks ahead of European Union requirements that will force Apple to enable...
articles.content: Apple is preparing to split the App Store "in two" in the coming weeks ahead of European Union requirements that will force Apple to enable app sideloading in the region, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman repo… [+1339 chars]
